Name: Frederick, Prince of Wales
Notes: married 1736, Princess Augusta of Saxe-Gotha; had issue, including the future George III

Name: Anne, Princess Royal
Notes: married 1734, William IV, Prince of Orange; had issue

Name: Princess Mary
Notes: married 1740, Frederick II, Landgrave of Hesse-Kassel; had issue

Name: Princess Louisa
Notes: married 1743, Frederick V, King of Denmark and Norway; had issue
